 i made 2 adjustments to that code.
the first was changing 1e8 to 1f8 so it didnt matter if youre drone or humanoid. the second was adding ZL+Dpad(up/down)
 to change the height. i figured i needed two separate combos because somehow i keep reset back to 0,0.
